title: Dentist-endodontist Teachers
job_description: Are you a dentist-endodontist? Do you want to deploy your knowledge and skills in dental education? Then, we are looking for you!Location: AMSTERDAMFTE: 0.4JOB DESCRIPTIONDue to educational innovations and to strengthen the (pre-)clinical education in the bachelor and master Dentistry, we are looking for dentist teachers. We are the Academic Center for Dentistry Amsterdam (ACTA), department of Endodontology. Our organization belongs to the absolute world top of research institutes (number 3 in the recent QS World rankings by subject). ACTA has nearly 500 staff members and around 900 students who are taking the Dentistry program. Around 300 patients visit ACTA every day on average.As a teacher you supervise motivated students who wish to provide the best dental care. With your experience, you increase their professional knowledge. You are a source of information, inspiration and you act as a role model. Your contribution to our next generation of dentists is great. ACTA works on the principle of competence-based training and also wants to educate the students in life-long-learning. You will acquire new didactic skills, which you can use in large and small-scale education, but also in your own practice. You work in a challenging academic environment with peers from various disciplines. You stay informed of the latest developments and your (international) network is boosted.Your dutiesAt the department of Endodontology, we give theoretical and practical lessons at various levels of education: bachelor, master and oral health sciences program Endodontology.You:coordinate, prepare, implement, execute and evaluate teaching activities. This concerns both (pre-)clinical and simulated educationsupervise dental and OHS students during treatmentlead or participate in patient discussionssome jobs require that you are involved in research and supervise students whilst they are working on their thesesREQUIREMENTSWe request that you:are in possession of a dental diploma recognized in the Netherlands or busy with getting a dental diploma recognized in the Netherlands (see bigregister.nl)you are recognized as an endodontist by N.V.v.E, E.S.E or equivalenthave good communication and clinical skillshave an affinity with education and are willing to develop in this area. You have a basic qualification in teaching or are willing to obtain itare flexible to work in a variation of taskshave a good knowledge of the Dutch language, both orally and in writingare at least available on WednesdaysWHAT ARE WE OFFERING?A challenging position within a socially involved organization. We offer you:options for following education in didactics and obtaining a basic qualification in teachingroom for personal development and career opportunities within ACTAopportunities for didactic and dental coursesan environment where you can work with peers from a variation of disciplinesan international, modern and dynamic academic atmosphereWorking conditionsDepending on relevant work experience, the salary is a minimum of â¬ 3,821 and a maximum of â¬ 5,230 (scale 11) gross per month, based on 38 hours per week. The position is classified according to UFO profile Dentist teacher level 3 for at least 0.4 FTE (16 hours per week).The initial employment contract is for the duration of 1 year, followed by indefinite employment if a positive assessment of the performance and all job requirements are met.In addition, ACTA has attractive fringe benefits and schemes that enable a good combination of work and private life, such as: 29 holidays in case of a full-time employment of 38 hours, 8% holiday allowance, 8.3% end-of-year bonus and a generous contribution to the ABP-pension scheme.ACTAACTA is the collaboration of the Faculties of Dentistry at Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam and the University of Amsterdam. We focus on all aspects of dentistry: from specialized training to outstanding research and the highest-quality patient care.Working at ACTA is working on leading international research and training. In 2017, ACTA ranked eighth in the QS World University Rankings. In addition to being an educational and research institution, ACTA also provides healthcare services. You will be working with peers from a variety of disciplines. ACTA has nearly 500 staff members and around 900 students who are taking the Dentistry programme. Around 300 patients visit ACTA every day on average.DiversityDiversity is one of our universityâs core values. We are an inclusive community, and we believe that diversity and international activities enhance the quality of education and research. We are always looking for people who can enhance diversity on our campus thanks to their background and experience.ApplicationAre you interested in this position? Please apply via the application button and upload your curriculum vitae and cover letter until April 3, 2022. Please upload you curriculum vitae and motivation letter. At ACTA it is mandatory that all staff is protected against Hepatitis B. Therefore we request that you upload a statement of the degree of protection in your application using the button: "Additional attachments".Applications received by e-mail will not be processed.Vacancy questionsIf you have any questions regarding this vacancy, you may contact:Name: Dr. Suzette van der WaalPosition: Head of the Department of EndodontologyE-mail: s.vd.waal@acta.nlTelephone: +31 20 5980442 (only on Wednesday)For more information please go to www.acta.nl
